name: TankNode
description:
Pick your tank and destroy everything in your way.

Features:

+ 4 vs 4 multiplayer battle.

+ Destroy enemies and their building to get point.

+ Collect gears to upgrade your tank: ammo, damage,...

+ Unlock new tanks.

Control:

+ A W S D : move

+ Mouse: normal shoot

+ E or Q: Skill 1

+ Spacebar: Skill 2
